body:
Okay! This should be ready for review.

The first commit moves the flake8 config, since adding more Python files broke our linting setup. The second commit adds the scripts needed for generating static files that mock out the API. We'll be using this to stand up a mock service that desktop QA can test the system add-on against.

I've filed [bug 1330415](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1330415) for standing up the S3 bucket and domain for the mock server. I dunno how CircleCI handles a deploy step failing, which it will until we get the credentials and bucket name in as environment variables on Circle. That's the only thing I can think of that might block merging this.

r?
